sentences.en: A moment or two later champagne in an ice-bucket materialized beside them.
sentences.cn: 片刻之后，他们身边出现了一只装着香槟的冰桶。

sentences.en: Berlin people drank champagne, set off fireworks and tooted their car horns.
sentences.cn: 柏林市民喝香槟、放焰火、鸣车笛。

sentences.en: Could this really stop the champagne from going flat?
sentences.cn: 这真的能让香槟不走气吗？

sentences.en: Eugene was concocting Rossini Cocktails from champagne and pureed raspberries.
sentences.cn: 尤金当时正在用香槟和覆盆子酱调配罗西尼鸡尾酒。

sentences.en: French perfume, champagne, and bridges in Paris… want to know more? Then next time we will return to Paris, and you will learn more about her.
sentences.cn: 还有法国的香水、香槟酒、巴黎的桥……。你想知道的更多吗？下次我们会谈到巴黎，您可以深入地了解她。

sentences.en: From the recesses of his coat Richard produced a bottle of champagne.
sentences.cn: 理查德从大衣里面掏出了一瓶香槟。

sentences.en: He'd had a few glasses of champagne himself and was fairly mellow.
sentences.cn: 他自己也已几杯香槟下肚，很是飘飘然。

sentences.en: I drank a cup of champagne.
sentences.cn: 我喝了一杯香槟。

sentences.en: If we're feeling flush we'll probably give them champagne.
sentences.cn: 等我们有钱了就可能会给他们喝香槟。

sentences.en: If you can't run to champagne, buy sparkling wine.
sentences.cn: 如果买不起香槟酒，就买汽酒好了。

sentences.en: On arrival, guests are offered wine or a champagne cocktail.
sentences.cn: 每位宾客一到场都会有人送上葡萄酒或香槟鸡尾酒。

sentences.en: One wine shop is coining money selling Wembley-label champagne.
sentences.cn: 一家葡萄酒商店正在靠出售威丽牌子的香槟大把大把赚钱。

sentences.en: Robin opened some champagne.
sentences.cn: 罗宾开了一些香槟。

sentences.en: The champagne cork popped when he pulled it out.
sentences.cn: 他拔香槟酒的瓶塞时它砰的一声开了。

sentences.en: The champagne is spilling out of the bottle.
sentences.cn: 香槟从瓶子中不断地溢出来。

sentences.en: The champagne sloshed and spilt.
sentences.cn: 香槟酒晃洒了。

sentences.en: The champagne-soaked event took over the city's main thoroughfare.
sentences.cn: 该市的大街上到处香槟飘香，盛事热闹非凡。

sentences.en: Waiter: Sir, what would you like to drink, wine or champagne?
sentences.cn: 服务员：先生，您想喝点什么？葡萄酒还是香槟酒？

sentences.en: We had a nice meal with a bottle of champagne.
sentences.cn: 我们美餐了一顿，还喝了一瓶香槟。

sentences.en: We ordered another bottle of champagne.
sentences.cn: 我们又点了一瓶香槟。

sentences.en: We regaled ourselves on caviar and champagne.
sentences.cn: 我们尽情地享用鱼子酱和香槟酒。

phrases.tran_cn: 凹底很深的酒瓶；香槟酒瓶

trans.tran_en: a French white wine with a lot of  bubble s  , drunk on special occasions
